field_text_formatted.value:
The Blog / The Experiment

For me, building a personal website is more about having an opportunity to experiment with web technologies, to building something fun and interesting.

And what better technology to experiment with for a site build, than my own technology?

But more than wanting to build my own, personal Druxt site, I wanted to build my personal Druxt site and be able to host it entirely on a CDN, with no live Drupal backend or database.

Serverless Drupal
